TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextEffectTarget extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Result from using to set an effect on text. This consists of the created and the to which the should be set.

remarks.format:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Enable() cil managed

Docs.summary: Enables the on the target text.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect> is already enabled, the method will be a no-op (no operation).
## Examples The following example shows how to apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.ScaleTransform>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform> text effect to text. Below is the XAML for the example.

Docs.summary: Gets a value that determines whether the text effect is enabled on the target element
Docs.value: **true** if the is enabled on the target; otherwise, **false**.
